grading.note: Two homework from textbooks for teamwork.

No written final exam. The final examination is “Final term paper: research project by an individual”
The PPT presentation in class during the final week, week 16, is on 5/30. The at least 10-page completed report will be due on 6/10. )

Paper-reading report: Choosing one empirical paper to study and report by a team. The timing is about the week between midterm and final week. (The paper-reading report should be uploaded one day ahead of the presentation in class )
